name: Good daBoy?
description:
The World is at war. For years now brave warriors and defenders of the kingdom have been fighting to their death to save the human race. Troops of undead are invading their last standing ground – the castle. You are a brave knight, who sworn to protect the king by any means. Yet the war has changed you, the belief in victory weakens every moment causing your personality to split into two. Medicine was always helpful in restoring your faith, but will you take it this time …

Created by:
Mutaz Alshaer
Ilya Razhkou
Christoph Prasch
Stefano Farina
Joseph Richard
